title: Rocky Picks
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: Rocky Pickaxe chronicles the depths, offering insight into the mineral-rich and mystical undersides of the world.
His observations guide quarriers through the dark labyrinths, emphasizing safety and reward amidst the underground's vastness.
With five insightful works, Rocky unearths knowledge and adventure found below, familiar as hearthstones yet boundless in mystery.
